comment.author: 37865451@N00
comment._content:
MILITARY FIELD MASS FOR NATION'S DEAD; More Than 30,000 Persons Attend Outdoor Service in Brooklyn Navy Yard.

May 29, 1911, Monday

Page 6, 1794 words

Thirty thousand persons attended yesterday the ninth annual field mass on the parade ground of the Marine Barracks in the Brooklyn Navy Yard, under the auspices of the United Spanish War Veterans, Gloucester Camp, No. 5, and the Long Island Chapter of the Knights of Columbus
